DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether general anaesthesia regional anaesthesia best patient undergo Total Hip Arthroplasty .
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize control trial ( RCT ) follow time 48 hr . Patients schedule primary Total Hip Arthroplasty . A total 120 patient randomly assign one two alternative ( general anaesthesia ( GA ) regional anaesthesia ( RA ) ) . General anaesthesia compare intrathecal anaesthesia give short length hospital stay ( LOS ) patient undergo total hip arthroplasty ( THA ) . Primary endpoint : LOS . Secondary endpoint : Postoperative pain ? Postoperative orthostatic function ( dizziness ) Time patient meet discharge criterion PACU How many patient need least one urinary bladder catheterisation
